author: Sean Maginness
comment: Have the matching sensor and it's rubish too. Won't connect to any computer I've tried, sometimes connects via this App.  The App just crashed over and over, totally unusable. I'm going back to Garmin.
title: Lame App that mostly crashes

author: Marcus Boneo
comment: Some phones have ant+. Like my Samsung galaxy note 3. Ant+ should be used to connect to the sensors as it would use less power and be more reliable. The smart sensors allow for ant+ connectivity. Why doesn't the app?
title: Should allow ant+ connectivity.

author: Yitzchok Shaffer
comment: Terrible. Doesn't keep the screen on during a ride, none of the export options actually work. Website is crap. No response from support.

author: A Google User
comment: I went for a 15 minute ride to see how it worked and it had already stopped. Way too short of a demo to see if the app is any good.

author: A Google User
comment: Smart usage of accelerometer for cadence. Sounds is a good feature too. i was surprised to hear how often my speed and cadence dross below my normal

author: A Google User
comment: Some nice ideas but I could not get it to track runs properly. Gp s tracking dies as soon as you go under a bridge and does not pick up again.

author: A Google User
comment: Demo version doesn't state it's a demo and doesn't warn you but just stop.

author: A Google User
comment: If the trial version is useless, why would I buy the paid version?

author: A Google User
comment: Crap crap and more crap cardiotrainer and my track are better

author: A Google User
comment: Great cadence. Setting up your own voice prompts could be more straight forward.

author: A Google User
comment: it seems to have switched for being a useful add on if you can figure out how to get your phone strapped to your thigh to being a advertisement for some kind of external bluetooth gadget. does the new version has the same functionality as the one I paid for? where is the paid for version? Do the comments relate to this app or to some kind of an extra purchased item. it looks like theyve totally confused the issue and perhaps abandoned the project . I just want something that'll help me with my cadence...
title: has changed

author: B W
comment: Garmin IS a Trillion Times BETTER Application to Use than this Crap!! 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎
title: Really is an awful application. Needs a rebuild from the very beginning. It CRASHES CONSTANTLY!!

author: Alexander Griboedov
comment: Looking at UI I assumed it has necessary features, ie cadence monitor, but had no luck. Application simply doesn't see my sensor.

author: A Google User
comment: Brilliant cadence from accelerometer. Nice trip tracking on Google maps.

author: A Google User
comment: Demo did not record a thing
